works.description:
Our client's publications contain textual
 
descriptions of thousands of camping and caravan sites throughout  
Australia. Our client's publications also contain compilations of  
information as to the facilities available at those sites.
We have inspected the infringing app ("Campin"), and found it to contain  

reproductions of both the text and the compilation of information from our
 
client's publications.

Our firm view is that the reproduction and communication of Campin from
the  
URL infringes our client's rights in its literary works.
